title: Should I be Proud or Ashamed of Gold 5?
body: Hey everyone. So recently, I made it to Gold 5. But ever since I haven't really found a way to keep going. I was wondering whether settling in at Gold 5 is something to be proud of or whether I should feel ashamed because I can't climb any further. What are your thoughts?

replies.body:
Based on oce.op.gg, you are in the top 25.79% of all OCE players.
Congratulations. I think you can be proud of it as it is quite an achievement
Haha thanks. I guess maybe I should take a break every once in a while ^-^
It was a lot easier for me to get from Platinum from Gold than to get from Gold from Silver. Just keep trying, everyone makes it in the end
Well since like 70% of all league players are in bronze I would feel quite proud tbh

Everyone gets stuck. It's up to you how you take it. 

First of all, you should be proud that not only you've reached Gold but that you've smashed your personal best (congratz btw). I personally find that there's a point in every season I get carried away after climbing a bunch of ranks and I either get stuck or get demoted (which is the state I'm in right now). All you can do is take a step back and try to ground yourself before figuring out what you need to improve on in order to get to that next division and the one after. If it happens it happens, but if it doesn't just chalk it up to a learning experience.
Feel pissed, because you stepped into an even worse level of bad

I see no reason not to be proud of being in gold 5. A large number of people can't make it to gold 5. A smaller amount make it past gold 5. By all means keep trying to improve. But don't be afraid to be proud of being in gold 5.
Gold 5 is cancer like silver 5 and bronze 5, people here are toxic and ragequit easily
Same, reached Gold V. I feel its harder to climb here than in S1 -> G5, my teammates are way worse idk why.
